description:
runtime: block signals during thread creation on openbsd

Block signals during thread creation, otherwise the new thread can
receive a signal prior to initialisation completing.

Fixes issue 3102.

messages.text:
Thanks.  Please remind me about this CL after Go 1 is out.

Russ

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

> On 2012/03/12 16:40:09, rsc wrote:
> > Thanks.  Please remind me about this CL after Go 1 is out.
> > 
> > Russ
> 
> Bumping this now that Go 1 is out.
> 
> PTAL.

LGTM. Does OpenBSD have cgo yet?

On 2012/03/12 16:40:09, rsc wrote:
> Thanks.  Please remind me about this CL after Go 1 is out.
> 
> Russ

Bumping this now that Go 1 is out.

PTAL.

On Mon, Apr 9, 2012 at 11:56 PM, <devon.odell@gmail.com> wrote:

> Does OpenBSD have cgo yet?
>
Not yet.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=196ac46dafc4 ***

runtime: block signals during thread creation on openbsd

Block signals during thread creation, otherwise the new thread can
receive a signal prior to initialisation completing.

Fixes issue 3102.

R=golang-dev, rsc, devon.odell, minux.ma
